channel.title: CVE Feed for Ali Rahimi -- Goftino
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ali Rahimi -- Goftino

item.title: CVE-2024-38697|2024-08-02T04:19:19.411Z -- ali%20rahimi -- goftino
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Ali Rahimi Goftino allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Goftino: from n/a through 1.6.
